column4: does anyone know some websites where I can find some grub splash screens?
need help with this: my login screen resolution is like 1280x1024x60 hz ! The default desktop resolution is 1024x768x85 Hz ..how do I change the login screen resolution to 1024x768x85hz ?
the max resolution I found in xorg.conf is 1024x768
when X decides that there is nothing usable in xorg.conf, it falls back to a list of standard resolution/vertical freq settings.
